>
[Brutal Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=174) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 93 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your critical hits are particularly devastating. On a critical hit with a melee Strike, add one extra damage die. This is in addition to any extra dice you gain if the weapon is [deadly](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) or [fatal](/Traits.aspx?ID=178). The target also takes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to two damage dice.
